pullrequest.title: Added spherical coordinates to the GUI

content.raw:
I made some minor changes to make the the fields read-only in the 
[spherical_coord_gui_readonly](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/spherical_coord_gui_readonly..spherical_coord_gui#diff) branch as suggested in the previous pull request. Feel free to merge if that's still the intended behavior.
